name: Mini War: Pocket Defense
description:
Watch out! Enemies are invading! Defend your kingdom against featured enemies! Deploy magic towers and summon historical heroes with creativity ingenious defensive strategies!

DOWNLOAD to fight in epic battles now！

PLAN YOUR STRATEGY & DEFEND YOUR KINGDOM!
*Build a maze of defensive towers and protect your royal kingdom from monsters with iconic personalities by any means!　
*Merge identical towers to upgrade your attacking force and place them tactically on the battlefield!
*Fend the invading enemies off with your strategy deployment!
*It's time to show the world who is the greatest TD strategist!

SUMMON HISTORICAL HEROES AND FIGHT IN EPIC BATTLES
*Discover and team up with a variety of historical heroes that you can't find anywhere else!
*Deploy your heroes: Athena, Lancelot, Merlin, and more. Let them lead you to victory!
*Upgrade heroes and collect runes to unleash their hidden potential!

UNLOCK VARIOUS MAPS
Explore the attractive and distinctive maps with magic themes: Plains of Serenity, Woods of Silence, Magma Temple, and more!

FANTASY VISUALS, WONDERFUL 3D GRAPHICS & ANIMATIONS
Beautiful, sophisticated fantasy world to gives you a sense of thrill!

* Language available: English, Korean, Japanese, traditional Chinese，French, Portuguese, German, Spanish, Italian
* More languages are coming soon
